title: (x) ASDA Money-off Vouchers handwriting script - Handwriting Plain {Neil Schaffer}
content:
Please see attached PDF.

Any ideas of where I can purchase this please?

Kind regards  
Neil

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0216 TMA Generic 6.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015010727/http:/typophile.com/files/0216%20TMA%20Generic%206.pdf) | 21.13 KB |
author: schaffs

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015010727im_/http:/typophile.com/files/asdamoneymarkers_5945.png)

Just thought I'd post an image to assist. :^)

Thanks Tiff,

I think it is called Handwriting Plain, but can't seem to find a commerical copy anywhere. Maybe it's one of those "free fonts".

Regards  
Neil

It is called Handwriting Plain, it _seems_ to be a free font and google will find it for you if you search "handwriting plain", trouble is some of the results _look_ like pirates.  
Tim
